item.title: Trump’s pardons wipe out payments to defrauded victims
item.description: In addition to clearing prison sentences, the president’s clemency actions have erased millions in restitution payments.

item.title: More than half of Americans live in places where recreational marijuana is legal
item.description: There are 24 states in the U.S. that have legalized the recreational use of marijuana.

item.title: Coast Guard abruptly deletes swastika, noose entry from policy manual
item.description: The announcement follows reporting by The Washington Post that detailed plans to downgrade the definition of such symbols to “potentially divisive.”

item.title: Judge in Wisconsin convicted of helping immigrant avoid arrest by ICE
item.description: The jury found Milwaukee County Judge Hannah Dugan guilty of a felony, obstructing an official proceeding, but acquitted her of a misdemeanor.
